description: As Kenyans head to the polls today to elect a president, there are already reports of violence. A disputed election back in 2007 led to weeks of tribal bloodshed. Voters in Switzerland have approved a referendum to curb executive pay. The move comes less than a week after the European Union announced plans to cap banker bonuses. And the late Larry Hagman will make his final appearance as J.R. Ewing on TNT's version of the show 'Dallas' tonight.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, March 4, 2013
byline: Sabri Ben-Achour, Scott Tong, Julia Simon, Amy Scott, Chester Wisniewski, Janell Burley Hofmann, Christopher Werth, Jeremy Hobson, Julia Coronado, Queena Kim and Nancy Marshall-Genzer
